amendment.description: Amendment adds the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure to the list of committees to receive a report on the April 25, 2006 unmanned aerial vehicle mishap.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to include the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure as a recipient of a report on the April 25, 2006, unmanned aerial vehicle mishap.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mica amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A019) offered by Mr. Mica.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Mica amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.
